opponent.label: Arash
opponent.artist: anonymouse, Zeuses Swan Song (mostly Zeuses Swan Song)
opponent.description: Arash is a cheerful and friendly Servant from Fate/Grand Order. He's a supernaturally skilled archer, able to shoot for miles and even fire meteors. Always quick with a hug or a kind word, he's grateful for a break from the busy life of a Servant in Chaldea.
